item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，埃利奥特和西南航空公司接近达成协议，以避免董事会之争
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，埃利奥特投资管理公司和西南航空公司即将达成和解协议，从而避免因争夺该航空公司董事会控制权而引发代理权争夺战。【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Southwest Airlines are close to reaching a settlement agreement that would avert a proxy battle over control of the airline's board, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国大选焦虑引发亚洲股市下跌；特斯拉财报为市场带来些许欢呼
item.description: 由于美国大选结果的不确定性使市场处于紧张状态，周四亚洲股市下跌，美元维持在三个月高点附近，美国收益率上升，尽管特斯拉公司超出预期的盈利为投资者提供了一些安慰。【原文：Asian shares fell on Thursday, while the dollar held near three-month highs and U.S. yields rose as uncertainty over the U.S. election outcome kept markets on edge, though Tesla's forecast-topping earnings provided some comfort for investors.】

item.title: Seven & i 首席执行官表示，新的公司结构将促进增长
item.description: Seven & i Holdings 公司首席执行官周四表示，该公司计划剥离表现不佳的业务，从而扩大其核心的 7-Eleven 便利店，因为这家日本零售商希望避免被加拿大以 470 亿美元收购。【原文：Seven & i Holdings' plan to hive off underperforming businesses will allow it to expand its core 7-Eleven convenience stores, its chief executive said on Thursday, as the Japanese retailer looks to avoid a $47 billion Canadian takeover.】

item.title: 波音工厂工人拒绝工资协议，延长罢工时间
item.description: 波音美国工厂的工人周三拒绝了新的工资提议，延长了罢工时间，这场罢工正在削弱这家陷入困境的飞机制造商及其供应商的财务状况。【原文：Boeing U.S. factory workers rejected a new wage offer on Wednesday, extending a strike that is crippling the finances of the troubled planemaker and its suppliers.】

item.title: 美元在美联储减息放缓、特朗普可能胜选的押注下屹立不倒
item.description: 受美联储放缓降息步伐的预期以及对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能第二次担任总统的押注不断增加的支撑，美元兑主要货币周四接近三个月高点。【原文：The U.S. dollar traded close to a three-month high against major peers on Thursday, underpinned by expectations for a slower pace interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and growing bets of a possible second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 地平线机器人公司股价在香港首日交易中上涨 28.3
item.description: 中国自动驾驶汽车制造商地平线机器人公司（Horizon Robotics）在首次公开募股中募集了 6.96 亿美元，该公司股票周四在香港证券交易所开盘上涨 28.3%。【原文：Shares of Chinese autonomous vehicle maker Horizon Robotics opened 28.3% higher on the Hong Kong stock exchange on Thursday after the company raised $696 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 特斯拉承诺明年推出付费机器人出租车，但仍存在重大障碍
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三表示，这家电动汽车制造商将于明年在加利福尼亚州和德克萨斯州向公众推出无人驾驶打车服务。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric vehicle maker will roll out driverless ride-hailing services to the public in California and Texas next year, a bold claim likely to face significant regulatory and technical challenges.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行任命彼得-赫伯特为业务部门代理首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac）周四表示，将任命彼得-赫伯特（Peter Herbert）从 11 月 5 日起担任其业务与财富部门的代理首席执行官。【原文：Australia's Westpac said on Thursday Peter Herbert will be appointed as acting chief executive for its business and wealth segment, effective Nov. 5.】

item.title: 油价走高，有望实现 3% 的周涨幅
item.description: 油价周四走高，收复了上一交易日超过1%的部分跌幅，此前美国原油库存增幅远高于预期。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Thursday, recouping some of the more than 1% losses from the previous session after U.S. crude inventories rose much more than estimated.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本工厂活动连续第四个月下滑
item.description: 周四的一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求低迷和订单疲软，日本 10 月份的工厂活动连续第四个月萎缩。【原文：Japan's factory activity contracted for the fourth straight month in October on subdued demand and weak orders, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿根廷政府称，世界银行和美洲开发银行向阿根廷提供 88 亿美元融资
item.description: 南美国家阿根廷经济部周三在一份声明中宣布，世界银行和美洲开发银行（IDB）将向阿根廷提供 88 亿美元的经济发展资金。【原文：The World Bank and the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) are providing Argentina with $8.8 billion in financing for economic development, the South American country's economy ministry announced in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: Platinum Equity 旗下英迈公司在美国首次公开募股中融资 2.33 亿美元
item.description: 英迈（Ingram Micro）周三表示，其美国首次公开发行股票的定价为每股 22 美元，在 20 美元至 23 美元的目标范围内，共募集资金 2.331 亿美元。【原文：Ingram Micro priced its U.S. initial public offering at $22 per share, within its targeted range of $20 and $23 on Wednesday, raising $233.1 million, the technology distributor said.】

item.title: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 申请 4.4 亿美元美国 IPO
item.description: 路透社周三看到的一份条款书显示，中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 已申请在纳斯达克首次公开发行股票，发行价最高可达 4.399 亿美元。【原文：Chinese self-driving startup WeRide has filed for an up to $439.9 million initial public offering on Nasdaq, according to a term sheet seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒制造商贝克公司第三季度净利润翻了两番
item.description: 墨西哥贝克公司是世界上最大的龙舌兰酒生产商，本周三，该公司第三季度净利润增长了四倍多，达到 8.9611 亿比索，收入比去年同期增长了近 4%，总额达到 109.5 亿比索。【原文：Mexico's Becle , the world's largest tequila producer, on Wednesday more than quadrupled its third-quarter net profit to reach 896.11 million pesos, while revenues ticked up nearly 4% from a year earlier to total 10.95 billion pesos.】

item.title: 熊市包围中国人民币，为特朗普获胜做准备
item.description: 中国货币正感受到唐纳德-特朗普可能重返美国总统宝座所带来的压力，这种压力不仅来自做空中国货币的投机者，还来自一直在囤积美元的内地出口商。【原文：China's currency is feeling the pressure from a possible return of Donald Trump as U.S. president, not just from speculators shorting the currency but also mainland exporters who have been hoarding dollars.】

item.title: Spirit Aero 将对约 700 名员工实施为期 21 天的休假
item.description: 美国供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司周三表示，将从 10 月 28 日起对大约 700 名从事 767 和 777 项目的员工实施为期 21 天的休假。【原文：U.S. supplier Spirit AeroSystems will implement a 21-day furlough for approximately 700 employees working on the 767 and 777 programs, effective Oct. 28, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士第三季度利润超预期，创历史新高
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周四公布了创纪录的季度利润，原因是这家英伟达（Nvidia）供应商的先进芯片（如用于生成式人工智能芯片组的高带宽内存（HBM））销售强劲。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix on Thursday posted a record quarterly profit as the Nvidia supplier saw strong sales of its advanced chips such as high bandwidth memory (HBM) ones used in generative AI chipsets.】

item.title: 韩国第三季度国内生产总值环比增长 0.1%，低于预期
item.description: 韩国央行周四的预估数据显示，韩国第三季度经济几乎没有增长，低于市场预期。【原文：South Korea's economy barely grew in the third quarter, missing market expectations, advanced central bank estimates showed on Thursday.】

item.title: Perplexity 首席执行官对道琼斯和《纽约邮报》起诉初创公司感到 "惊讶
item.description: Perplexity 首席执行官阿拉温德-斯里尼瓦斯（Aravind Srinivas）周三在《华尔街日报》科技直播会议上表示，媒体大亨鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的道琼斯公司和《纽约邮报》对这家搜索初创公司提起诉讼令他感到 "惊讶"。【原文：Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas was "surprised" by a lawsuit from media baron Rupert Murdoch's Dow Jones and the New York Post against the search startup, he said at the WSJ Tech Live conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大科技股下跌，日元加速下滑
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国议员就投资承诺向汽车制造商斯泰兰特施压
item.description: 包括参议院两大民主党人在内的近 80 名国会议员周三敦促汽车制造商斯太朗斯履行其与美国汽车工人工会签订的合同中的投资承诺。【原文：Nearly 80 members of Congress, including the Senate's top two Democrats, on Wednesday urged automaker Stellantis to honor investment commitments that are part of its contract with the United Auto Workers union.】

item.title: 联合租赁公司第三季度利润低于预期，原因是利润率下降
item.description: 联合租赁公司（United Rentals）周三公布的第三季度利润不及预期，原因是该公司所有设备租赁部门的利润率均有所下降。【原文：United Rentals missed third-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday, on lower margins across all of the equipment rental company's segments.】

item.title: 波音国防业务是 "核心"，但新任首席执行官面临重重困难
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）预计，这家飞机制造商的国防业务将在预算紧缩的旧合同重压下继续挣扎，但他在周三表示，尽管存在许多问题，但生产直升机、战斗机和导弹的部门仍然是公司未来的 "核心"。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg anticipates the planemaker's defense business will continue to struggle under the weight of budget-busting older contracts, but he said on Wednesday that despite many problems the unit making helicopters, fighter jets and missiles remains "core" to the company's future.】

item.title: Ameriprise Financial 公布第三季度利润增长，得益于强劲的手续费收入
item.description: 美国财务顾问公司 Ameriprise Financial 周三公布第三季度利润增长 11%，原因是市场反弹提升了客户资产价值，帮助该公司赚取了更多的费用收入。【原文：U.S. financial adviser firm Ameriprise Financial reported a 11% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, as a market rally boosted the value of its client's assets, helping the firm earn more in fee income.】

item.title: 美国监管机构仍陷于僵局，巴塞尔首席执行官敦促各国完善资本规则
item.description: 国际监管机构巴塞尔银行监管委员会（BCBS）主席周三为其提高风险管理标准的努力辩护，并敦促监管机构尽快完成巴塞尔资本规则的最终版本。【原文：The chair of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS), the international regulatory body, on Wednesday defended its efforts to boost risk management standards and urged regulators to quickly complete the final set of Basel capital rules.】

item.title: 澳门业务疲软，拉斯维加斯金沙第三季度利润不及预期
item.description: 拉斯维加斯金沙集团（Las Vegas Sands）周三公布的季度利润未能达到分析师的预期，主要原因是其位于澳门的伦敦人赌场（Londoner casino）正在进行翻修，而新加坡赌场的每张赌桌收入低于预期。【原文：Las Vegas Sands missed analysts' expectations for quarterly profit on Wednesday, hit by an ongoing renovation at its Londoner casino in Macao and lower-than-expected per table income in Singapore.】

item.title: 阿根廷 8 月份经济活动萎缩程度低于预期
item.description: 阿根廷官方统计机构周三表示，阿根廷 8 月份经济活动比 7 月份增长 0.2%，环比降幅低于预期，这是南美国家连续第三个月出现同比萎缩。【原文：Argentina's economic activity grew 0.2% in August from July and fell less than expected from a year ago in the South American country's third straight month of year-on-year contraction, its official statistics agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: IBM第三季度利润超出预期，得益于软件业务的强劲增长
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）周三公布的第三季度利润超出分析师预期，这主要得益于其高利润率软件部门的强劲增长，因为企业优先考虑IT服务支出，并加倍努力采用人工智能。【原文：International Business Machines beat analysts' estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by robust growth in its high-margin software segment as businesses prioritized spending on its IT services and doubled down on AI adoption.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛第三季度净利润下降 5
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周四公布，其第三季度净利润同比下降 5%，降至 129.3 亿比索。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit posted on Thursday a 5% year-on-year dip in its third-quarter net profit to 12.93 billion pesos.】

item.title: 美泰在假日购物前下调销售预期；成本控制提升利润率
item.description: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰公司周三下调了全年销售预期，因为在玩具需求低迷的背景下，该公司即将进入关键的假日购物季。【原文：Mattel lowered its full-year sales forecast on Wednesday as the Barbie parent heads into the crucial holiday shopping season against the backdrop of muted demand for toys.】
